summary.para: Note: This API is now obsolete. Use the FieldDomain.DisplayName property.

Gets or sets the display name. This property is now obsolete because it is not usable in XAML where Name is reserved for framework elements. Use DisplayName property instead. Setting this property will Set the DisplayName property.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.WebMap.Document.GetMapServiceItem(ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.Layer,System.Action)
member.summary: This method preforms the request based on item id to arcgis.com to see if any additional information is found for the item. Additional information may be present for map service items if they are configured. If no additional information is configured the reseult should be an empty string.

The callback handler to ruturn from async method.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.WebMap.Document.ServerBaseUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the server base URL from where items can be loaded.
member.remarks: If not set, defaults to ArcGIS Online: "http://www.arcgis.com/sharing/content"

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.WebMap.Document.BingToken
member.summary: The token for being used by Bing Maps. If this is not set, Bing maps layers will not load until the token has been set.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.WebMap.Document.ProxyUrl
member.summary: URL to proxy the requests through when necessary. If this is not set, layers that require a proxy will not be loaded.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.WebMap.Document.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets the token. If this property is not set, non-public documents will not be loaded.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.WebMap.Document.GeometryServiceUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the geometry service URL.
member.remarks: The geometry service URL is required if the web map document specifies a spatial reference different from WGS84 geographic coordinates or WebMercator. If this is not specified, the map will load at full extent. Note that extent is not set if the map is created from and will also load at full extent.
